mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user ( id, username, password, state, nickname, createTime, updateTime, delFlag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{state}, #{nickname}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE delFlag = 0 AND id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE delFlag = 0 AND username = #{username}
SELECT id, username, state, nickname, createTime, updateTime, delFlag FROM sys_user WHERE delFlag = 0

SELECT id, username, state, nickname, createTime, updateTime, delFlag FROM sys_user
AND delFlag = 0
AND username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
AND nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nickname}, '%')
LIMIT ${current - 1} , #{size}

AND delFlag = 0
AND username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
